title: (x) Hawaii Superferry logo - Delta Jaeger {Tiff}
content:
What typeface is used in this [logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215227/http:/www.hawaiisuperferry.com/)?

 [‹ (x) Heroes TV series title sequence (credits) - Tim Sale Brush {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215227/http:/typophile.com/node/29986 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Hammer" techno sans face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215227/http:/typophile.com/node/32209 "Go to next forum topic")
author: biddy

comments.content: What a good thing to show anyone designing type!

Wow - this would have been perfect for that solar car logo I was working on. I’ll have to file it away if they want to hire me for next year.

- Lex
